topic: Cat News, the official newsletter of the IUCN/SSC Cat Specialist Group, first began publication in 1984 and continues to serve its subscribers by offering a diverse collection of scientific papers, ar...

items.text: The consistent publication of 'Cat News' provides a valuable historical record of scientific advancements in felid research.
The 'diverse collection of scientific papers' likely contributes to the body of knowledge used by policymakers and conservation organizations.
